channel.title: Release on Hop
channel.description: Recent content in Release on Hop

item.title: Apache Hop 2.14 is available!!
item.description:
After about two months of work on 35 tickets by 7 contributors, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.14.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.14 brings: Updated release cycle Mail server metadata type Various improvements and fixes Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.

item.title: Apache Hop 2.13 is available!!
item.description:
After about two months of work on 84 tickets by 8 contributors, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.13.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.13 brings: Multiple GCP Storage locations MySQL Bulk Loader Transform Various improvements Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.

item.title: Apache Hop 2.12 is available!!
item.description:
After about two months of work on 58 tickets by 11 contributors, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.12.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.12 brings: Variable resolvers Various improvements Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.12.0 right away.

item.title: Apache Hop 2.11 is available!!
item.description:
After about two months of work on 109 tickets by 16 contributors, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.11.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.11 brings: 4 NLP and LLM transforms Git improvements Syntax highlighting UI improvements Various changes Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.

item.title: Apache Hop 2.10 is available!!
item.description:
After about four months of work on 139 tickets, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.10.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.10 brings: Notable bug fixes New Features Block code execution in UDJC and UDJE Ability to configure multiple Azure accounts File Explorer perspective improvements Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.

item.title: Apache Hop 2.9 is available!!
item.description:
After more than three months of work on 83 tickets, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.9.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.9 brings: Static Schema Static Schema Metadata Type Schema Mapping transform CrateDB database dialect and bulk loader Various Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.

item.title: Apache Hop 2.8 is available!!
item.description:
After more than three months of work on 79 tickets, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.8.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.8 brings: Two new AWS transforms AWS SNS Notify AWS SQS Reader Various Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.

item.title: Apache Hop 2.7 is available!!
item.description:
The Apache Hop PMC is proud to announce the release of version 2.7.0, this release contains 51 tickets and some work that has not been covered by tickets. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.7 brings: Redshift Bulk loader JDBC Driver refactoring Improvements Enhanced JSON Ouput Formula Transform Underline transform names Improved Brazilian Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.

item.title: Apache Hop 2.6 is available!!
item.description:
After a summer of hard work on 65 tickets, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.6.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.6 brings: Apache Beam Upgrade and doc updates New Google Transforms Google Analytics 4 Google Sheets Input and Output Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.

item.title: Apache Hop 2.5 is available!!
item.description:
After another two months of work on exactly 100 tickets, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.5.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.5 brings: Apache Beam Upgrade Documentation Beam and Google Dataflow how-to guide Extended Apache Airflow how-to guide Looping how-to guide Hop Gui Improvements Various changes and improvements Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.

item.title: Apache Hop 2.4 is available!!
item.description:
After another two months of work on 98 tickets, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.4.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.4 brings: New Features Improvements Container image Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.4.0 right away. Apache Hop 2.

item.title: Apache Hop 2.3 is available!!
item.description:
After almost two months of work on 82 tickets, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.3.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.3 brings: Weblate - New Translation tool Documentation updates Vertica Bulk Loader Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.3.0 right away.

item.title: Apache Hop 2.2 is available!!
item.description:
After almost two months of work on over 160 tickets, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.2.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.2 brings: Hop GUI improvements Welcome Dialog A new navigation viewport New data grid toolbars instead of right-click menu Configuration perspective Hop Web Various component upgrades Apache Beam and Google Dataflow Various Community JIRA or download Hop 2.

item.title: Apache Hop 2.1 is available!!
item.description:
After four and a half months of work, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.1.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.1 brings: MongoDB Apache Beam Execution Information Framework and Data Profiling Kubernetes Documentation New plugins Community JIRA or download Hop 2.

item.title: Apache Hop 2.0 is available!!
item.description:
After three months of work, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 2.0.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.0 brings: Upgrade to Java 11 Chinese translations New transform plugins Apache Avro File Output Apache Doris Bulk Loader Drools Rules Accumulator Drools Rules Executor Formula Apache Beam upgrade Various Variable Annotations Dimension Lookup/Update new dialog Integration tests Community JIRA or download Hop 2.

item.title: Apache Hop 1.2 is available!!
item.description: The Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 1.2.0. A huge thank you to everyone involved to made this possible. Read on for an overview of what has changed in this release or download Hop 1.2.0 right away. Hop Gui Hop Gui continues to evolve. The following list of improvements will make you even more productive in Hop. HOP-3298: Hop Gui now remembers the last environment you used when you switch to a project.

item.title: Apache Hop 1.1 is available!!
item.description:
After four months of work, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop 1.1.0. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible.
Let's take a closer look at what Hop 1.1 brings: Known Issue Hop Server Docker Apache Beam updates and improvements New and updated plugins Hop Gui improvements Various Community JIRA Download Hop 1.1.0 or download Hop 1.

item.title: Apache Hop (Incubating) 1.0 is available!!
item.description:
After more than two years of work, the Apache Hop community is pleased to announce the general availability of Apache Hop (Incubating) 1.0.
This 1.0 release is the result of a massive amount of work by the Apache Hop community. Let's take a closer look at what Hop 1.0 brings: Code Architecture, cleanup, refactoring Hop GUI and a uniform set of tools Projects and Environments Portable runtimes: design once, run anywhere Unit, Integration and Regression Testing Life cycle management Community Code Architecture, cleanup, refactoring Since Apache Hop started from the Kettle (Pentaho Data Integration) code base in late 2019, no stone has been left unturned.

item.title: Apache Hop (Incubating) 0.99 Release Available!
item.description: The Hop community is pleased to announce the availability of the Apache Hop (Incubating) 0.99 release, our last stop before Hop 1.0. This release contains over 3 months of work. Since our 0.70 release in late April, we’ve seen a lot of activity in a variety of areas. The focus for this release was on hardening Hop to deliver our users the most scalable, robust, documented and tested Hop experience possible.

item.title: Apache Hop (Incubating) 0.70 Release Available!
item.description: The Hop community is pleased to announce the availability of the Apache Hop (Incubating) 0.70 release. This release contains about 2.5 months of work. Since our 0.60 release in late January, we’ve seen a lot of activity in a variety of areas. Hop contributors not only worked on code: we’ve received contributions in artwork, translations, documentation etc. We have more than 45 new plugins, and a total of 223 jira tickets were implemented.

item.title: Apache Hop (Incubating) 0.60 released
item.description: Less than three months since Project Hop joined the ASF Incubator (late October 2020), we’re happy to announce Apache Hop 0.60, our first release as an incubating project at the Apache Software Foundation. Apache Hop (Incubating) 0.60 - Source only As stated earlier, one of the main goal of the incubator program is to give projects the time to adopt "The Apache Way". As such, it took us a bit of time to get the entire process straightened out.
